text:
I went to Punggol by MRT and it is very spacious bus interchange with modern facilities.If you need to go to the City area, then of course, you need to take MRT.

It is very clean bus and MRT interchange including the facilities like Toilet.
Very useful and efficient bus station. Can be slightly unsafe at the opening, with some bad accidents involving deaths to pedestrians. Be very careful crossing the roads here.
Bus 83 ,85 driver not alert! I'm there waving to them at the punggol interchange. Yet they drove off!

Lost my atm debit card and went to the station to collect, they advised me that deal to security reason, the item has been sealed and will be sent off to their main office.

I felt it was a good and effective gesture that little things like this matters. I felt safe that they actually had procedures put in place to help make lost and found item claimable to the rightful owners. Thank you persons on duty today! Incident recall approx 1545hrs : At SBS transit punggol bus interchange 3rd August 2024.

Spacious bus interchange that you can reach easily from the MRT. Connects you to the rest of Punggol area. Take bus 84 to go to Coney Island. Make sure you take Exit B from the MRT to reach this place.
